channel.title: [508] How do I make a monster aggressive like Jad?
channel.description:
Okay well I want to make K'ril and his followers aggressive on a 508 and this is what it says in npclist.cfg
[code]// ID LV HP MH AT WN SD AE BE DE AD NN ND npc = 6203 650 255 49 0 1 90 6945 6944 6946 7 K'ril Tsutsaroth A_servant_of_the_god_Zamorak. npc = 6208 142 150 21 0 0 90 6944 65 6946 7 Zakl'n Gritch Scourge of light. npc = 6206 151 161 17 2 1 90 6947 65 6946 7 Balfrug Kreeyath Despoiler of Ullek. npc = 6204 145 142 15 1 2 90 64 65 6946 7 Tstanon Karlak Destroyer of 1000 planes! npc = 6219 115 100 11 0 2 90 0 0 0 7 [/code]
And in npcspawn.cfg is says:
[code]// ID AX AY HI NEX NEY SWX SWY NN spawn = 6203 2930 5325 2 2935 5330 2919 3519 K'ril Tsutsaroth spawn = 6208 2934 5328 2 2935 5330 2919 3519 Zakl'n Gritch spawn = 6206 2934 5321 2 2935 5330 2919 3519 Balfrug Kreeyath spawn = 6204 2935 5325 2 2935 5330 2919 3519 Tstanon Karlak[/code]

item.title: [508] How do I make a monster aggressive like Jad?
item.dc:creator: @skittle385 skittle385
